trait.name: Gunslinger
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the Gunslinger ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, the drow ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The deck wizard has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

Firearms aren't widely available in the North, but some members of Bregan D'aerthe are equipped with Lantanese pistols, bullets, and packets of smokepowder. These drow gunslingers are expert pistoleers, as skilled with their guns as the best archers are with their bows.
